movies.title: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night

jump_scares.spoiler: The room suddenly shakes and the lights cut out
Brandon jumps out at Tori (as a joke)
A figure moves quickly past in the foreground as Tori returns to the house
Brandon suddenly lunges at his mother and makes a barking noise
Caitlyn backs away from the open window and is startled when the bedroom door behind her bursts open
There is the sound of twigs snapping and suddenly Brandon appears right in front of Tori
The light suddenly breaks above the waitress
A figure moves past in the foreground
The door is suddenly pulled away
Brightburn suddenly lunges at the waitress
There is a knock at the door during a tense scene
Brightburn suddenly flies through the truck window
There is a sharp flashback to earlier in the movie as Kyle lies in bed
The baby with red eyes suddenly lunges at the camera just as Kyle wakes up from a dream
There is a loud crash and Tori screams
As the 911 operator answers, Brightburn suddenly smashes through the living room
As Tori says “I’m here I’m here” Brightburn flies past right in front of her
Brightburn suddenly tackles the sheriff as he says “you’re safe now” to Tori
The camera pans back to the deputy and Brightburn is now standing right behind her
Brightburn suddenly flies into the room where Tori is hiding
A crow flies out from behind Corey and Jonah, startling them
Jonah jumps out from behind a desk to scare Jango and his gang
Corey turns on the lighter and there is a cut to the ghost girl standing right in front of him and screaming
A boy bangs on the car window, startling Carrie
A girl smashing into the window in front of Sue may startle some viewers
Carrie’s mother, who appears to be dead, suddenly gasps
(alternative ending)  As Sue lies on the surgical table after giving birth, a bloodied hand suddenly appears. [Video]
Sue reaches down to put flowers on Carrie’s grave however a bloodied hand reaches out of the ground and grabs her. [Video]
A man walks into a coffee shop and unexpectedly shoots a customer
During a quiet scene there is suddenly a sound of glass shattering and a cut to the sound waking Luke up
Luke slowly moves towards a seemingly passed out Daniel, who suddenly bites at him
Doctor Braun calls out to Daniel, followed by a cut to Daniel standing right beside his ear and speaking which frightens him
While Luke is walking through a hallway, there is a sudden cut to a deformed face zooming towards the camera while roaring
The deformed man runs at Luke while screaming
A stranger rushes at Alex with a knife
A dark figure rushes toward the screen behind Alex’s nana
Adam startles himself awake chasing Lucy in a library dream sequence
Henry notices Adam’s fingers moving as he and Liz dump the bodies
Pollidori backs away from Liz’s body and us startled by his wife in the hall
Adam punches through Pollidori’s car window
A man suddenly attacks Hernandez from behind
The sound of a gunshot and a bullet hitting a wall right next to Phoenix
A hand smashes through a glass door and grabbing a thug from behind
The blind man attacks a thug from behind
The blind man hits a thug from behind
The dog suddenly lurches out of nowhere and barks
Phoenix is grabbed by a thug
In Doctor Thurman’s office, Donnie screams “I can see him right now” and, accompanied by a sound effect, the camera cuts to Frank who is standing in front of him
Ricky (one of the bullies) grabs Gretchen in Grandma Death’s cellar
There is a loud explosion on the plane
Lucy’s daughter appears in a dream and doesn’t appear to be human
Adrian startles Lucy while she snoops around his office
A hand print appears on the window, accompanied by a loud sound effect
Eli wakes up suddenly (this is accompanied by a sound effect)
A stone suddenly hits the window, startling Eli
As Eli wipes the condensation off the window, the girl jumps out and says “BOO!”
As Eli runs down the hallway, he shines the torch back into the darkness and the ghostly girl is suddenly running right towards him
The lights turn back on and a shadowy figure stands right behind Eli
The shadowy figure bursts through the curtain but it is revealed to only be Eli’s father
Eli moves the mirror slightly to reveal a ghostly girl standing in the room behind him
A hand suddenly grabs onto the cupboard
As Eli slowly turns around, a hand reaches out from behind the shower curtain
An invisible presence pulls at Eli’s top (not particularly startling however it is accompanied by a high pitched sound effect)
During a tense scene, the sound of the automatic door closing behind Eli may be startling to some
Rose pushes the top off the stone well to reveal several corpses inside
The corpse comes alive for a second facing the soldier
One of the monsters attacks a soldier
The camera suddenly cuts to a monster
A monster suddenly turns around facing the camera
The monster in the corner that disappeared reappears from the side
The cat lunges at the screen and hisses
During a dream sequence, Laura follows a wasp along the window and suddenly sees Marina standing in front of her
A startling image of some disfigured faces flashes up on the screen
As Laura backs away from the mirror, a demonic face appears beside her
A sketch of Laura’s face is pulled away from the camera suddenly to reveal a disheveled looking Marina
Gustavo looks down and sees the two disfigured faces from Marina’s Facebook page
A hand grabs Gustavo and the screen goes black
Gustavo runs past the camera
A close up of some eyes suddenly appears on the computer screen
A demonic face appears at the door as Kobe runs towards it
A door slams shut
The corpse like figure on the bed sits up
The person in the bathtub looks at Isabel
Olivia looks up from the paper and sees a girl slitting her throat
A phone rings during a tense scene
Olivia looks through a peephole and sees the demonic girl’s face
A body falls on Tyler’s car
A man is suddenly attacked by Olivia
As Kobe backs away from the demon girl he bumps into Laura
Kobe stabs Laura
Laura turns around and the demonic girl rushes at her

movies.title: I Am Not a Serial Killer

jump_scares.spoiler: A woman is suddenly hit by a car while crossing the road
Mrs. Crowley calls out in her sleep
Accompanied by a sound effect, Mr. Crowley bursts into the house
As Sarah steps outside, the homeless man walks right in front of her
A car suddenly crashes into the back of Kylie’s car
The driver of the white car walks up to Kylie’s window, accompanied with a loud musical sting
The computer that Kylie’s using, short-circuits
The freezer makes a mechanical noise, startling Kylie
A statue of Jesus wrapped in a white sheet stumbles and falls towards Kylie
After Kylie’s ankle bracelet beeps, grabbing her attention, a diseased-looking hand comes out from under a piece of furniture and grabs her leg
While she’s in the shower, Kylie crouches and is then attacked by the possessed teddy bear, accompanied by a loud musical sting
Graham startles Kylie while she’s dancing
The lights come back on and a veiled figure suddenly appears besides Dennis, accompanied by a loud musical stinger
While Amos is trying to look through the presumed killer’s window, Kylie suddenly opens it from inside, startling Amos in the process, accompanied by a musical stinger
The flash from Amos’s camera reveals the presumed killer’s silhouette standing behind a window, staring at Amos. This is accompanied by a loud musical stinger
The burned teddy bear in the back of Amos’s car suddenly starts to speak and startles him, accompanied by a musical stinger
Eugene slams into the door of the pick-up truck just as Kylie closes it. Accompanied by a musical stinger
Kylie turns around and Miriam suddenly appears in front of her
A sudden scene transition from a silent scene to Kylie loudly and violently opening a kitchen shelf may startle some viewers
Dennis suddenly goes on the attack, accompanied by a musical stinger
Miriam opens a cupboard in the bathroom and Eugene stumbles out of it, prompting both of them to scream. Close-up on Miriam’s face as she’s screaming. Accompanied by a musical stinger
After stabbing Eugene through the wall, Dennis suddenly kicks down the wall
Dennis suddenly comes out of frame and punches Kylie unconscious
Jacob sees some birds flying above him at the party
Jacob sees a horn come out of Jezzie’s mouth as she dances
A sudden cut to a car braking and hitting a bike might startle some viewers
Jacob sees the reflection of his son in the mirror and reaches out to touch it however a demon head appears and he pulls back
Eli attacks a man under the bridge
Eli jumps on Lacke and attacks him
Abby suddenly attacks the man who picked her up
The police officer attempts to break down the door, frightening Owen
Owen shouts at the police officer, causing him to turn around, Abby then jumps up and attacks the police officer from behind
A girl is stabbed up through the bottom of her chin
The sound of a door slamming shut
Hiding under a car, Frank suddenly cuts a girl’s Achilles tendon as she comes close
Anna’s friend Martin is suddenly sliced with a cleaver through his mouth and face
Martin, who we presume is dead at the time, suddenly hits Frank with a baseball bat
As Frank opens his van door, Anna, presumed to be still out cold, suddenly stabs him
Ma bangs on the window as the group are about to drive off
Some eggs are thrown at Ma’s car window
While in Ma’s bedroom, Haley and Maggie are startled by a girl holding a scary mask over her face
A teenage boy jumps out with a gas mask on and  growling to scare Sarah
The same teenage boy is suddenly stabbed all the way from the back of his head and out through his eye socket, pushing his eyeball out
Sarah is suddenly grabbed from behind
Harry Ward is shot from behind just as he was about to attack Tom
‘Frank The Trucker’ opens his cab door, only to see Harry Ward in the cab, immediately followed by Harry Stabbing Frank through the top of his skull
A sudden sound cue and visual of pool balls being hit
Tom turns around and is suddenly attacked by Harry Ward
Tom turns around in the cage only to be face to face with the killer
Harry Ward suddenly appears and attacks Ben Foley
The lights in the grocery store abruptly and loudly turn off
The pick-axe goes through the door missing Sarah’s face by a hair
Harry Ward suddenly appears at the window
Ex-Sheriff Burke suddenly bangs on the car window
The deputy opens the bloodied dryer door and a steaming, grotesque head falls out
Ex-Sheriff Burke turns around and is immediately stabbed by Harry Ward
Harry’s shadow appears on the wall
A miner’s uniform suddenly falls
Harry ward suddenly appears
Tom swings a pick-axe at his rescuer, stabbing him through the head
Paul wakes up and Annie is standing directly over his bed
Annie shoots Buster through the back with a shotgun
Annie jumps on Paul as he crawls away

During a nightmare, Sy is standing in an empty SavMart store with his eyes shut. He opens his eyes to reveal they are filled with blood. Suddenly he yells out and covers his face as blood gushes out of his eyes
A shadowy figure suddenly appears on Sami’s car’s back seat
Sami’s car radio comes on
Sami’s car radio comes on, again
As Sami shuts the hood of her car, an shadow of a figure unexpectedly appears on it
As Sami turns around, a man with a bloodied face suddenly appears in her car’s back seat
Accompanied by a sound cue, a figure suddenly appears in a dark doorway
A brick is thrown through a window accompanied by the sound of glass breaking
A homeless man bumps into Holly
As Holly lies back down, Seth is revealed to be waiting beside her
Philip pushes the puppet off the bed. (Not really a jump scare but somewhat sudden and accompanied by a loud sound.)
The puppet rushes towards Philip
As Philip approaches a door, the puppet steps in front of a window on it and stares at him
A masked assailant suddenly runs at Philip from a dark corner of the room
The shower curtain is pulled aside revealing a person with long blonde hair holding a knife
A blonde woman runs toward Mr. Arbogast and attacks him with a knife
Lila turns around suddenly and gasps
Lila turns the chair around revealing a preserved dead body

While spoiling as little as possible, during a scene in which Amanda is in bed and Maud is next to her, Amanda says something that upsets Maud, causing her to begin crying. A few seconds later, Amanda suddenly springs upwards and her face looks distorted

Hard to describe without spoiling as it is literally the final shot of the movie, but can roughly be described as a scene in which Maud is lifting her arms and people are bowing down, there is a sudden cut to her screaming
There is suddenly a loud flash of several spooky images accompanied by a loud sound effect
Oz has a vision where he sees a clone of himself slowly approaching him. Suddenly, there is a cut to the clone’s face as he begins to scream
There is a sudden flash of Oz’s clone screaming
A hand grabs Jude after he opens the door
The counselor jumps out from behind a gravestone and punches Jude
June jumps on Jude from a tree branch
June turns on a light switch and it causes a lamp to explode
As the kids are walking away a flashlight suddenly turns on in front of their faces
Wallace grabs June’s hair
As Jude looks towards Eric it suddenly cuts away to Eric jumping at him
A deer flies through the car window, shattering it
Dennis suddenly appears in front of the locker that Claire is hiding in
Claire is suddenly dragged off screen
Several sudden movements by “The Beast” as he approaches Casey from a dark hallway may startle viewers
The little girl suddenly turns around with blood all over her
Because Sissy is lost in her thoughts, she hits a kangaroo with the car
Sissy stares at the creepy painting and therefore gets scared by Alex coming in
Alex grabs the phone and looks around as she discovers the dead body of Jamie in the grass
Sissy starts hitting herself with her phone
After removing a few towels from under the bed, Emma finds Tracey’s corpse
While Emma is trying to process what happened, Sissy appears in the door behind her
A figure pops up from underneath the water in front of Kenny
Meg is stabbed through the shower wall while taking a shower
A body falls through the shower curtain and lands in front of Mel
Judy screams and we see the silhouette of her raised hands
An arrow pierces Mel in the neck
There is an abrupt cut from the flashback back to Angela who jumps up and hisses at the group
Sarah leaves the toilet cubicle and sees the casting director standing outside
Sarah’s fit abruptly ends
A light suddenly illuminates Sarah
The dark room is lit up several times over the next minute or so as a camera takes photos of Sarah
Several images flash quickly across the screen (a couple of which show Sarah with blood around her mouth)
There is a flash and Sarah falls to the floor
A bright light appears on the screen accompanied by a sound effect
The casting director grabs Sarah through the bed sheet
The door closes by itself and Sarah grabs Tracy
One of the ghost kids suddenly appears (loud noise, during a pan to the right
One of the ghost kids is floating in the air (cut, loud noise
When the kid is cycling, suddenly the ghost kids appear (cut, loud noise
After a long moment of silent tension, The Riddler lunges at the man with a roar
While Batman and Catwoman are looking into the trunk, loud gunshots suddenly hit the car
In the wide angle shot, someone suddenly appears in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
Batman is startled by a cop who is guarding the crime scene
A dog barks, startling Ted
The nurse screams when she sees the blob, and loud music begins to play
Steve gets startled by Jane when he walks around the corner
After Steve goes off screen, there’s a loud sound of cans falling down
A basketball hits Cole in the head as the title credits show on the screen
The camera pans around to reveal Bee watching Cole as he attempts to jump out the window
Cole backs into Sam’s corpse
Sonya slams her fist into some couragated iron near where Cole is hiding
Max is suddenly behind Cole
There is a loud sound effect as Cole bumps into something (but it’s only a potplant)
Alison grabs Cole around the leg
Alison is suddenly shot in the head (with gory results)
As Catherine attempts to soothe Edward, his face suddenly distorts into a grotesque monster
While admiring his latest drowning victim, the body suddenly flinches
A deformed Edward jumps through a hole in a tree, startling Catherine awake form her dream
Glass partitions drop from the ceiling cutting a horse into 12 living cross-sections
Stargher’s alter ego descend the staircase and demands to know where Catherine comes from
Catherine begs Carl to tell her the location of Julia when his alter ego attacks her
Zooey jumps out at Astrid as she enters the house
A sudden cut to the painting of the boy screaming accompanied by a sound effect may startle some viewers
Several quick cuts to a burning girl may startle some viewers
Astrid startles Jesse out of his trance
Jesse’s tire blows out
Jesse suddenly begins to slash his painting with a knife
There is a car crash outside the house
There is a loud gunshot
The dog suddenly barks as Robyn approaches the door
Robyn wipes the steam off the shower window to reveal Gordo standing behind. [Video]
A large window shatters suddenly
Simon is punched in the face by a masked man
Simon’s stereo suddenly turns on

movies.title: The House with a Clock in Its Walls

jump_scares.spoiler: A demon head pops out of the clock beside Lewis
A tentacled creature bursts out of the door behind Jonathan
During a flashback, Isaac grabs Jonathan’s throat after Jonathan checks him for a pulse
Some manure suddenly lands on Lewis
Birds fly out of the secret entrance as Jonathan crawls inside
Lewis shines his torch on a statue and Tarby suddenly shouts “BOO!”
There is a loud bang from inside the coffin
One of the toys grabs Lewis around the ankle
David attacks the security guard in the parking lot
Michael screams in horror as the brothers drop into the fog from the train bridge
The family dog attacks Michael when he enters the bathroom to kill Sam
Thor the dog lunges at Lucy
Edgar plunges a wooden spike through Marko’s heart
Paul leaps out from behind the bathroom door
Max turns around revealing he is a vampire
Grandpa drives his jeep into the house killing Max with a large wooden spike
Brent is grabbed by Lola from behind while looking down the hole
Lola’s scrapbook flies at the windshield while Holly is driving
While the camera slowly zooms in on Lola there is a cut to the car right in front of her when they collide
Damien suddenly appears with vampire like teeth, accompanied by a sound cue
A gorilla slams against the glass, cracking it
Katherine Thorn closes the bathroom cabinet door revealing a demon in the mirror
Father Brennan is impaled by a metal pole
A dog suddenly attacks Robert Thorn
Keith is decapitated
Mrs. Baylock suddenly jumps on Mr. Thorn’s back and attacks him
Mrs. Baylock smashes the car windshield
Accompanied by a low pitched sound effect Milo suddenly attacks a girl
Milo imagines hinself suddenly stabbing Sophie in the neck (a low pitched sound effect plays at the same time)
The front door buzzer startles Anna
Anna witnesses the crime
Katherine’s bloody hand slams against the window
The answering machine picks up and Jane starts speaking, starting Anna who was spying through her cameras
Anna jumps at a noise while discovering the truth about the real Jane Russell
Ethan jumps out behind a trellis and hits Anna in the face with a garden digger
A personal trainer zombie attacks the glass
Body parts fall from the fire escape and land on a dumpster
A pack of zombies, led by R, bust through the pharmacy lab doors
Zombie dad makes a run and lunges at Perry before being shot dead
The skeleton eaters jump and claw at the door as R and Julie escape
M runs over three skeleton eaters with a luggage cart
Julie’s dad pulls a gun on R
A dead body/zombie jumps on Julie
